ygData.subject: Re: enchant armor
ygData.msgSnippet: This is not really a warrior question, but you guys might know how to do it. I have an enchanter friend who would like to enchant ore in order to make magical
ygData.messageBody:
This is not really a warrior question, but you guys might know how to do it.
I have an enchanter friend who would like to enchant ore in order to make
magical armor. We have looked forever trying to find the spell to enchant
ore but can't. I'm sure you guys can understand the importance of magical
armor. Anyway we want to make it to sell cheap to other players. If anyone
has played around with this or knows anything about it please tell.

Arathorne, Solsek Ro
